name: Refract: Future Ping-Pong
description:
A retro arcade classic with a modern makeover!

It's Ping-Pong- but not as you know it!  Challenge yourself in three unique game modes against an increasingly brutal AI.

Four Unique Game Modes-

• Against the Clock - Score more times than your opponent before time runs out. Simple

• Strikeout - Wipe out your opponents lives before they wipe out yours!

• Multiplier - Score as many times in a row as you can to maximise your multiplier!

• Brick-Breaker Challenge Mode - Arkanoid style brick smasher - 1 or 2 player
